comments:
If you create an RCP app which has help and launch that app with no instance data by setting 

osgi.instance.area=@none

and then attempt to open the help contents help does not launch and an exception is written to the log. I'm not sure what the expected behavior is but at a minimum we should inform the user with a message box why the help server could not initialize.
